channel.title: Heroes of Newerth Beta registraions are open!
channel.description:
http://www.heroesofnewerth.com/open_create_account.php
For today only I think? Go go go.

item.title: Heroes of Newerth Beta registraions are open!
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

Elijah:

Sucks for me, I signed up for it after waiting half a year for an invite. I finally get to register today. And I can’t even open the client without it crashing.

Mine crashes too a lot if I change some of the graphics setting, and then all my menus get messed up. But for you, that really sucks.

Read full topic
item.source: Heroes of Newerth Beta registraions are open!
